All lands are Islands in addition to their other types.
Tutte le terre sono Isole in aggiunta ai loro altri tipi.
Alle Länder sind zusätzlich zu ihren sonstigen Typen Inseln.
Tous les terrains sont des îles en plus de leurs autres types.
Todas las tierras son islas además de sus otros tipos.
すべての土地は、自身の他のタイプに加えて島でもある。
모든 대지는 자신의 다른 유형에 더불어 섬이다.
Все земли являются Островами в дополнение к своим другим типам.
Todos os terrenos são Ilhas além de seus outros tipos.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if(filtered_obj ~= nil) then filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():SubType_GetWritable( filtered_obj ):Add( LAND_TYPE_ISLAND, filtered_obj) filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():GrantAbility(1) end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.
Le creature senza volare o passa-Isole non possono attaccare.
Kreaturen ohne Flugfähigkeit oder Inseltarnung können nicht angreifen.
Les créatures sans le vol ou la traversée des îles ne peuvent pas attaquer.
Las criaturas que no tienen la habilidad de volar o de cruzar islas no pueden atacar.
飛行か島渡りを持たないクリーチャーは攻撃できない。
비행 또는 섬잠입 능력이 없는 생물은 공격할 수 없다.
Существа без Полета или Знания Островов не могут атаковать.
Criaturas sem voar ou travessia de ilha não podem atacar.
STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY and FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Get( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING ) == 0 and FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Get( CHARACTERISTIC_ISLANDWALK ) == 0)
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_CANT_ATTACK, 1 ) end end
